meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chuck Lane Maureen Fernbacher Randy Kaplan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1617.

div.div: Missing introductions and the Jeopardy! Round.

td.p: Chuck Lane, a magazine writer from New York City
Maureen Fernbacher, a school librarian from Salisbury Township, Pennsylvania
Randy Kaplan, a foreign currency trader from Orange County, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,800)

tr.td: WILD CATS

Maureen

toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', '(Maureen: What is Finland?)

Helsinki

RandyMaureen
')

')

')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Randy
Maureen
Chuck
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
MaureenWhat are Pat and Mike?
$3,099
ChuckWhat is ???
$1,701
RandyWhat is "Pat & Mike"?
$2,900
Pat and Mike')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The only Tracy & Hepburn film with their characters\' names in its title')

tr.td: FAMOUS MOVIE PAIRS
The only Tracy & Hepburn film with their characters' names in its title
Randy
Maureen
Chuck
3-day champion: $49,800
2nd place: a trip on Delta to Phoenix, Arizona & stay at the Phoenician + Jeopardy! home game or Jeopardy! Challenger
3rd place: Oneida Silversmith gift certificate + Jeopardy! home game or Jeopardy! Challenger
Randy
Maureen
Chuck

30 R
(including 2 DDs),
1 W

7 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

9 R,
1 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
